short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change out that boring NewTab page with something that'll help you learn Kanji from WaniKani!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learn your WaniKani Kanji from your new-tab page with a different one randomly showing up everytime you open a New-tab! 

Upon creating a new tab, of course, we pull the Kanji from WaniKani and on the flip side of the card we place the reading for the Kanji, if in a given situation you don't know the answer to a Kanji clicking the card will reveal the answer!
